Navigation
Name Rascal/Libraries/LabeledGraph/top
Synopsis Determine the set of top nodes (roots) of a labeled graph.
Function set[&T] top(LGraph[&T] G)
Description Returns the top nodes of LabeledGraph G, i.e., the root nodes that do not have any predecessors.
Examples 
rascal>import LabeledGraph;
ok
rascal>top({<1,"A",2>, <1,"B",3>, <2,"C",4>, <3,"D",4>});
set[int]: {1}
